name: Police 911
storyline: Shinjuku Kabukicho, the city that never sleeps. I caught information on a secret transaction of the designated gangster "Gokudokai" who plans to smuggle a large amount of handguns from the United States. Police officers who fight day and night against gangster crimes that threaten a peaceful life.
summary: An arcade light-gun shooter with a camera to detect player movement, allowing the player to use body movement to hide behind cover and dodge the (slow-moving) bullets. It was the first video game with fairly accurate full-body motion detection, and probably the only one with a motion-controlled cover system.
